alert.note: Alert for La Salle; Livingston (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 8:22PM CDT until July 14 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Livingston County in central Illinois... Southern La Salle County in north central Illinois... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 822 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Varna, or 8 miles northeast of Lacon, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ottawa, Streator, Marseilles, Oglesby, Seneca, Wenona, South Streator, Tonica, Grand Ridge, Cornell, Lostant, Ransom, Rutland, Cedar Point, Kangley, Long Point, Dana and Leonore. Including the following interstates... I-39 between mile markers 41 and 54. I-55 between mile markers 199 and 204. This includes... Illini State Park, Matthiessen State Park, and Starved Rock State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
